title: A Rowland for an Oliver: or, a sharp rebuke to a sawcy levite In answer to a sermon preach'd by Edward Oliver, M.A. before Sir Humphry Edwin late Lord Mayor of London, at St. Paul's Cathedral, on Sunday October 22. 1698. By a lover of unity.
author: Ridpath, George, d. 1726.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed in the year 1699. and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,
